entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
